data.description: Images on Gtk::Canvas like C64 sprites
data.communities: perlmonks.org - posted there, no discussion (yet). Was voted up.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Sprite relies on Gtk::Canvas, so it should have Gtk in it's name.
    It's a pure perl widget, but it doesn't wrap another widget, it
    works along side it.

    There appear to be no other modules performing this function (that
    I could find).
